review: I think that I shall never seeA binder lovelier than thee.Full of women's names, the bestbinder clutched against my breast;This binder makes me feel like God,When hiring gals for less-pay jobs,A binder that my staff holds close,Filled with women who can vote;On whose careers we men have stood,richer, `cause, well, `cause we could.Poems are made by fools like me,But only Avery ...made this really useful binder.With apologies to Joyce Kilmer.
productTitle: Avery Durable View Binder with 2-Inch Slant Ring, Holds 8.5 x 11-Inch Paper, White, 1 Binder (17032)
